abstract: Legislators in Nebraska grapple during special session with public outcry over Keystone XL pipeline, which would cut through heart of state; proposals include new standards that would give state power to regulate pipelines within its borders, and request to divert pipeline away from a crucial water source.
snippet: Legislators in Nebraska have been unexpectedly summoned to a special session over the Keystone XL pipeline, which would run through the states on its way from Canada to the Gulf Coast.
lead_paragraph: Legislators in Nebraska have been unexpectedly summoned to a special session over the Keystone XL pipeline, which would run through the states on its way from Canada to the Gulf Coast.

headline.main: Nebraska Seeks a Say on the Route of a Pipeline
headline.print_headline: Nebraska Seeks a Say On the Route Of a Pipeline
headline.seo: Nebraska Legislature to Debate Keystone XL Oil Pipeline
